p: The exposure consisted of submitting plants to naturally occurring solar radiation and precipitation during 2019 at their harvest place at the Institute of Pharmaceuticals Researchâ€”UFPB and collecting adult plants to observe changes in the content of investigated compounds among each month of harvest. Solar radiation incidence and precipitation data were collected on the website ( https://portal.inmet.gov.br/) of the National Meteorologic Institute of Brazil (INMET).
